name: How to comfort someone who is crying
name_original: How to comfort someone who is crying
description:
This game was made for the Random WikiHow Game Jam, where my theme was " How to comfort someone who is crying ". I have been pretty lucky with this theme.

The goal of the game is to help your depressed friend, but in a clumsy / dumb way. 

And check out the devlogs ! ( even if there isn't anything really interessing )
